title: How to unsubscribe from Vseosvita
description: Learn how to cancel your Vseosvita subscription. Follow these steps to manage your subscription through the Google Play Store.

steps_1.title: Cancel Vseosvita Subscription via Google Play Store
steps_1.description:
Follow these steps to cancel your Vseosvita subscription through the Google Play Store:

*   Open the Google Play Store app on your device.
*   Tap on the profile icon located in the top right corner of the screen.
*   Ensure you are logged into the correct Google account associated with your Vseosvita subscription.
*   Go to 'Payments & Subscriptions', then select 'Subscriptions'.
*   Select the Vseosvita subscription you wish to cancel.
*   Tap the 'Cancel Subscription' button.
*   Confirm your cancellation by selecting a reason from the provided drop-down menu.
*   Tap 'Cancel Subscription' to finalize the process. You will receive a notification confirming the cancellation.

seo_text: Cancel Vseosvita subscription, Vseosvita cancellation guide, unsubscribe from Vseosvita, manage Vseosvita subscription, Google Play Store subscriptions.
